segments.text: Hi , Jenny ! Jason here . It's great to hear your voice again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hi , Jason ! Long time no see . How's the hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's pretty nice , but I'm going to start looking for an apartment soon . Hotel living is not for me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about you ? When are you leaving for Berkeley ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am leaving in two weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So soon ! Well , I'd really like to see you again before you leave . Would you like to go out with me on Friday ? I'd like to take you to dinner and maybe a movie or something afterwards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry , Jason . I've already got plans for Friday evening . How about Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Saturday is fine . I'll make dinner reservations for 7 o â€™ clock . Is that ok ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll pick you up at six thirty .
segments.speaker: S2
